moves.1. e4: This was a short game that was played between me and Kartal_ist. It was such ashame that he timed out as I would learn a valuable lesson on playing the open Sicilian regarless of the outcome.
moves.1... c5 2. Nf3 e6: I was expecting d6 but e6 is also fine.
moves.5... Be7: I would prefer Qc7 or a6 here.
moves.6. Be3 Nf6 7. Ndb5: Taking advantage of the weakness on b5 and in future d6.
moves.8... a6 9. Nd6: There's a massive hole on d6 now. This is when he timed out.
